8caaff6e-0430-4516-8d08-8de5f29b5f86: Whenever you assume a wild shape form, you gain resist acid 10, and your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g}. If you assume a wild shape form that already has acid resistance, it increases by 5 instead. If you assume a wild shape form that deals acid {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, the acid damage your wild shape form deals increases by one damage die category (for example, a 1d6 becomes a 1d8) in addition to the extra damage.

If you assume a wild shape form that already has cold resistance, it increases by 5 instead. If you assume a wild shape form that deals cold {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, the cold damage your wild shape form deals increases by one damage die category (for example, a 1d6 becomes a 1d8) in addition to the extra damage.
adc138b1-e5c0-4c34-838b-e966dab02a3b: Whenever you assume a wild shape form, you gain resist electricity 10, and your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. If you assume a wild shape form that already has electricity resistance, it increases by 5 instead. If you assume a wild shape form that deals electricity {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, the electricity damage your wild shape form deals increases by one damage die category (for example, a 1d6 becomes a 1d8) in addition to the extra damage.
4aa80afd-7cb9-45aa-b0f7-cb4bd9aa8af6: Whenever you assume a wild shape form, you gain resist fire 10, and your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. If you assume a wild shape form that already has fire resistance, it increases by 5 instead. If you assume a wild shape form that deals fire {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, the fire damage your wild shape form deals increases by one damage die category (for example, a 1d6 becomes a 1d8) in addition to the extra damage.
5e091346-3cb0-4e7d-b7ef-ba507b8f9f2e:
Your wild shape form gains the benefits of one energy type for both offensive and defensive purposes.
Benefit: When you assume a wild shape form, choose one of the following energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. You gain resistance 10 to that energy type. Also, your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of the chosen energy type. If you assume a wild shape form that already has {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} of the same type you choose, it increases by 5 instead. If you assume a wild shape form that deals damage of the same energy type you choose, the {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} your wild shape form deals increases by one damage die category (for example, a 1d6 becomes a 1d8) in addition to the extra damage.
